content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the defendant has been ordered to pay a total of €845 in fees including legal fees stamp duty and court fees the court decided on the division of matrimonial property awarding certain items to the applicant and others to the defendant the court also discussed the establishment of an asset balance in accordance with the civil code the applicant is seeking the dissolution of their marriage custody of their minor son and monthly maintenance payments from the defendant they also want to keep a vehicle and have the defendant pay the costs of the proceedings the court has determined that the marriage is dissolved and has awarded certain property to the applicant the defendant is required to give various items to the applicant and pay additional costs

metadata.cost: 741.00 EUR (legal fees) + 62.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 42.00 EUR (court fees)
